title: The Earle of Craford his speech before the Parliament in Scotland October the 25, 1641 upon his examination by the Lords concerning the late conspiracie against the Marquise Hamilton, Earle of Argile, Lord Lowden and divers others of the nobility in Scotland.
author: Crawford-Lindsay, John Lindsay, Earl of, 1596-1678.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
